profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.2 Document Catalog Dictionary - Contains Metadata Key
profile.description: The document catalog dictionary of a conforming file shall contain the Metadata key.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: The document catalog dictionary of a conforming file shall contain the Metadata key.

error.message: The document catalog dictionary doesn't contain metadata key.
